page.title: 20<<<< EDUCATION 2 >>>>
page.content: The Primary School. In MALPAS there is only one primary school. The children from class 5(10/11 year olds) and class 3 (6/7 year olds) COMPILED THIS PROJECT. Some FACTS ABOUT OUR SCHOOL: Name: Malpas Alport Endowed Controlled Primary School. Age :96 years old. Opened 1889. Headteacher. John Womersley (age 36) Staff: Head plus 6 teachers. 3 caretaking staff 8 dinner ladies. Number of children: 182 (June 1985) curriculum a full primary range including basic skills and the creative arts plus computer education. School times. 9..a.m. till 12 noon;l.15 p.m. till 3,30 p.m. Age range: 4+ to 11+ At 11 the children transfer to the Comprehensive School: The Bishop Heber High School. (over 1000 pupils).
